item.title: Colors of Twitter
item.description: Basically by combining Twitter feed data (100 million tweets and counting) with a language detector (together with some geometric post-processing, and lots of hours of coding), I was able to offer a quite detailed look at the language geography of the Twitter universe. Note: to compensate the dominance of English on Twitter, I manually limited the boundaries of this language in particular. I can generate GeoJSON output, which can be displayed as an interactive map:
